attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many of us know about the recent idea's of banning all 60watt and 100watt incandesant bulb's. Yes this may be saving C02 emmisions and saving peoples money but will effect the reptile keeping hobby! Many keepers use 100watt + bulbs to actually keep the animals. If these were banned what would we do? We carn't use energy saving bulbs, they dont give of enough heat .. something must be done! We must be considered, both home keepers and zoo's!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
